description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe defining how to fetch, configure, install, and manage the Quagga routing software suite. It specifies source URLs, dependencies, systemd services, configuration files, installation steps, and package components.

classes.name: quagga
classes.description: Main class encapsulating the configuration and build steps for the Quagga routing suite.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Defines the steps to install Quagga binary, configuration, systemd services, and fix paths.

methods.name: pkg_postinst
methods.description: Post-install script to initialize system state, such as masking systemd services.

methods.name: pkg_prerm
methods.description: Pre-removal scripts to stop running daemons before uninstallation.
